title: v1.6.3.2+ Documentation Patterns
details:
Updated Copilot instructions and agent files for v1.6.3.2+ with new architectural patterns:

1. UICoordinator DOM Verification: _verifyDOMAfterRender() with DOM_VERIFICATION_DELAY_MS = 150
2. VisibilityHandler Delayed Emit: STATE_EMIT_DELAY_MS = 100 for DOM verification before emit
3. CreateHandler Async Init: async init() loads quickTabShowDebugId from QUICK_TAB_SETTINGS_KEY
4. QuickTabWindow Defaults: DEFAULT_WIDTH = 400, DEFAULT_HEIGHT = 300, DEFAULT_LEFT = 100, DEFAULT_TOP = 100
5. MinimizedManager dimension logging: BEFORE/AFTER snapshot application

Storage Keys:
- State: quick_tabs_state_v2 (storage.local)
- Settings: quick_tab_settings (storage.sync) with quickTabShowDebugId boolean
